track.name: Hear Me
comments: Can nobody hear me? I got a lot that's on my mind.
Perfect.

This is the older demo version.. you can hear the slight difference between this and the Night Visions one :D
This song is awful. [2]

This song is awful. The lyrics make no sense. He's singing that he can't breathe, but he's using his breath to sing. "Can nobody hear me?" Obviously, when you're addressing "Nobody" and not "Anybody." Horrible, horrible and lazily crafted song.
